hero.pageTitle: Create your showcase website without writing a single line of code
hero.pageSubtitle: jyLWeb combines several OpenAI models to generate a clean Astro static site, 100% tailored to your business.
hero.lead: You answer a few questions, jyLWeb orchestrates AI models for positioning, content, structure and code, and delivers an Astro ZIP ready to deploy to GitHub, Vercel, Netlify or your own server.

features.leftText: Generate as many variations as you want, jyLWeb keeps a full history so you can re-download everything.
features.rightText: You get 100% of the static files (HTML/CSS/assets), with no lock-in.

hero.previewText: "We capture the light behind every story." AI-generated copy, fully editable before export.

workflow.title: From a few answers to a ZIP ready to deploy.
workflow.body: jyLWeb chains specialized AI models: business understanding, page structure, copywriting, then generation of clean Astro components.
workflow.step1Body: Describe your business, your tone of voice, your colors and your goals (appointments, sales, branding…).
workflow.step2Body: jyLWeb generates sections, headings, paragraphs and CTAs tailored to your business, with an SEO-friendly structure.
workflow.step3Body: You get a ready-to-use ZIP: Astro files, static HTML, CSS, assets. You can modify everything and version it on Git.

forWho.title: Designed for freelancers, studios, agencies & small brands.
forWho.f1Body: Designers, devs, photographers… launch a clean portfolio in one evening, without spending 3 days writing copy.
forWho.f2Body: Quickly create solid website bases for your clients, then refine and plug them into your pipeline.
forWho.f3Body: Restaurants, coaches, clubs, side-projects… a clear, modern showcase site that’s easy to maintain.

stack.title: Astro, OpenAI API and Tailwind, without black magic.
stack.s1Body: Ultra-fast pages, easy to host anywhere (Netlify, Vercel, GitHub Pages, Nginx server…).
stack.s2Body: Multiple prompts: persona, structure, wording, then component generation. Not just a simple “chat” with HTML.
stack.s3Body: Clean, organized code you can version, refactor and turn into internal templates for your agency or clients.

dashboard.welcomeBody: Generate your showcase website in a few minutes.
dashboard.paypalHint: You will pay via PayPal (card or PayPal balance). Minimum purchase is 3 credits.
dashboard.purchaseSuccess: Payment completed. Your credits have been updated.
dashboard.purchaseError: Payment failed or cancelled. Please try again.

history.introBody: Find here the sites you’ve already generated. You can re-download the ZIP or reopen them later.
